title: Lagging and I am not sure why
body: Recently, I have been experiencing crippling lag while in game. My ping will be in a good range of 30-40 and then for whatever reason around 10 to 15 minutes in it will jump up to around 200-230 ping. Can any rioter out there help me and explain what's going on and how I can fix this? It has happened in my last 4 games or so and I can not figure out why.

replies.body:
Most of the time, latency (ping) changes are caused by issues along your network routing to the server. Before we take a look at your route, let's first ensure your local network settings are compatible with League by working through the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if you continue to have latency issues after working through those steps.
